page.title: 02POPULATION OF KEMBERTON
page.content: The estimated population of Kemberton is 252.There are 10 children under 5 and 29 aged 5 to 16.There are 36 people aged 16-21 and 143 aged 21-65.There are 34 over 65.This compares with a population of 380 in 1841. About half the population have been in the village over 20 years.About 5 families have been in the village for 2 or more generations. At one time the village was mainly occupied by farm workers,council workers and miners employed at Kemberton colliery.Now it is a commuter village.Amongst the residents now are doctors,businessmen,teachers,a surgeon,a chemist,a solicitor,an architect,an accountant and a factory inspector. House prices are high and few young families move into the area.
